definition: to look forward to sth/to wait respectfully
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: I believe you are Mr. Green. I have been expecting you.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得你就是格林先生，我恭候你很久了。

sentences.english: We'll meet you at the gate of the hotel at six this evening.
sentences.chinese: 晚上六點我們在飯店門口恭候。

sentences.english: It is but a day's journey from this place, and it waits for thy coming.
sentences.chinese: 戒指在離這裏不過一日行程的地方，恭候您的大駕。

sentences.english: Zhang Degang-the factory director with all employee await respectively each friend's presence.
sentences.chinese: 廠長張德剛攜全廠職工恭候各位朋友光臨指導。

sentences.english: We look forward to seeing you, Mr. Zhao.
sentences.chinese: 趙先生，我們恭候您的光臨。

sentences.english: Then, true to their word, they showed up – just as police were coming to greet them.
sentences.chinese: 說到做到，信守諾言，他們露面時，警察恭候在銀行。

sentences.english: Then the journey continues on to a campsite where camels await you.
sentences.chinese: 然後繼續前往一個營地，在那裏會有駱駝恭候大駕。

sentences.english: We look forward to welcoming you at Kempinski Hotel Suzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我們恭候閣下光臨蘇州金雞湖凱賓斯基大酒店。

sentences.english: I was expecting you. Are you NYPD or FBI?
sentences.chinese: 恭候多時了。你們是紐約警局的還是聯邦調查局的？

sentences.english: Have already arrived a dining time, everyone awaits respectfully over there.
sentences.chinese: 已經到了用餐時間，大家都在那邊恭候大駕。

sentences.english: You can see it in all its glory at Sydney Airport, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 店鋪位於澳大利亞的悉尼機場，恭候您的品鑑。

sentences.english: Welcome customers to visit and we are waiting for you.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎廣大客戶來廠考察，我們恭候您的光臨。

sentences.english: We'll be waiting for Henry and Eileen.
sentences.chinese: 我們恭候亨利和愛琳的光臨。

sentences.english: We are looking forward to welcoming the guests to the Barony Wanyuan Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我們恭候貴賓光臨邦臣萬源大酒店。

sentences.english: The Eton Hotel, Shanghai is ready. Are you ready to discover Eton?
sentences.chinese: 上海裕景大飯店已做好準備，隨時恭候您的光臨。

sentences.english: Hepburn enterprises more sincerely waiting for the general domestic and foreign clients to come to visit and guidance.
sentences.chinese: 海普企業更真誠恭候廣大國內外客戶前來考察和指導。

definition: we are honored by your presence
to wait for (orders, a decision, a judgment)
to reserve a seat for sb (idiom)
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to hold one's breath (in anticipation) (idiom)/to anxiously await
to grace sb with one's presence/your arrival (honorific)/your esteemed presence
to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
(polite) excuse me for not going out to meet you
